features: Large travel makeup mirror; this makeup mirror overall size is 9.8* 7.5in, which is larger than the small size travel mirror. Package included extra 10X magnifying mirror, suitable makeup for eyeliner, eyebrows, and lipstick, make your makeup details more perfect.

Rechargeable travel makeup mirror; built in large capacity rechargeable 2000mAh battery, which can be available at any time through charged by a laptop, mobile power supply or charger; Ultra thin, compact and lightweight, easily placed in your backpack, suitable for travel, hotel, home or other cosmetic occasions

3 Color lighting mode; press the light button to change the light color, 3 colors can be freely adjusted according to your needs, white light simulates sunlight, suitable for going out, natural light is bright and suitable for indoor use, yellow light is soft, simulating evening party and gathering lighting

Adjustable brightness; the mirror has highly sensitive touch control, hold the screen switch longer, light brightness dim or bright. 75-90 degree free rotation angle, you can easily find the vanity mirror angle you want

Ideal gift for her; It can be an ideal gift for mom, girlfriend, wife, etc. on Birthdays, Valentine's Day, Mother's Day, Christmas, New Year, or other special festivals. If you have any questions about the product, please feel free to contact us at any time

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Miroposs Large Travel Makeup Mirror with Light The large travel makeup mirror is high definition regular 1x mirror, the 1X mirror has no magnification or distortion, you can clearly see your makeup. The package included a 10X magnifying mirror, which can make your makeup details more perfect. Compared to small size travel makeup mirrors, our product is larger and brighter. Ultra thin, compact and lightweight, easily placed in your backpack, you can use it for travel, hotels, home, or other makeup occasions Tips : The product includes regular mirrors and small circular mirrors, only small circular mirrors have a 10X magnification effect.Makeup mirror can be used in low light conditions for 180 minutes. If use a bright light, the mirror battery will consume faster. Products Including 1 x Travel Makeup Mirror 1 x 10X Magnifying Mirror 1 x User Manual 1 x USB Cable

Highly sensitive touch control Press the screen switch to turn the light from dim to bright, click the lighting button to change the light color Main Switch ON/OFF Please turn ON this button before use, it built in large capacity rechargeable 2000mah batteries which can be available at any time Free Angle Rotation Free angle rotationn from 45° to 90°, choose suitable makeup angle to make your makeup easier

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High Quality Portable Mirror
reviews.reviewText: Very nice folding mirror that is easy to travel with from room to room or take in a suitcase. The white plastic case is very shiny and has a premium feel. Both Mirrors (the main mirror and the 10x round add on mirror) are very nice distortion free glass and provide very sharp reflections.This arrived in a high quality box packaged very well in bubble wrap with a micro USB charging cord and instruction book. The 10x close up mirror has two suction cups on it so you can move it as necessary. There is a physical on/off switch on the back near the micro USB charging port and charge indicator light. The lid/stand has a magnet in it that keeps the lid shut tight when closed. The border of the mirror lights up in a very uniform/continuous manner and provides a nice boost of light for when using the mirror. The base folds to cover the mirror for protection when not in use. The glass mirror is slightly recessed so when closed, the glass does not get touched by the base. Our mirror came with some charge in the battery and lasted a while before we needed to actually charge it. It has been in use for a few weeks and lasts several days between charges.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Convenient and needed!
reviews.reviewText: This mirror is perfect! Perfect size, lightening, for traveling, on the go, everything. Used it for a trip and my daughter and I fought to use it, now we need another one.Charged it once and it lasted for 2 weeks while traveling international.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best LED portable mirror
reviews.reviewText: I love this portable mirror! It's perfect for travel and surprisingly charges quickly! I appreciate the 3 different tones, and I'd say it gets pretty bright! I've been using this in my "cloffice", since I don't have a vanity, and it's been really useful. So far, I've traveled with it twice, and it's super lightweight. Bonus points for the charger being a USB!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice mirror with one minor issue for me.
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this mirror for travel use. The mirror itself is large and well lit. My only concern is the size of the 10x small mirror that attaches well via suction cups. I feel that the small magnifying mirror could have been slightly larger. I wanted a magnifying mirror for hands-free eye makeup application. I have not used it as yet, so we shall see if the small mirror is adequate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Convenient travel mirror
reviews.reviewText: I got this mirror for when I travel love the various light settings and how portable it is. It’s lightweight and easy to carry in travel bag/ size is just right.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This mirror is amazing! The size is much larger than most of the others. It charges fast and my wife and granddaughter both have one and they enjoy using it. The stand is solid and it is very easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The size is perfect! Not too small, but not too big! Everything came well packaged, even the box was cute! The lights are powerful and I love the different options! I like the option to add the 10X mini mirror if wanted or leave it off! I’m excited to travel with this! Well built mirror and would purchase again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very portable/travel makeup mirror
reviews.reviewText: This super light portable makeup mirror is perfect. Love the dimming capability and color range of the LED lights. Light weight and cover folds over to protect during travel. USB charging is great so no need for batteries.
